data.description: Battle Creek bungalow 2 bedroom 1 bath  with full basement. Roof was replaced in 2020.. Large living room/ dining area.  There's a 20 X 24 detached garage... Home is Sitting on a double lot.. Garden area..All appliances stay. Large aluminum handicap ramp stays.. Call Scott Harrington @ 269-420-0197 for a private showing
